Question: Aforative Media
Answer:
Found in 2016, Aforative Media (AF) has been almost five years since we provide a wide range of photography, videography, and video hybrid meetings and conference live-streaming for our local and international clients. Throughout the whole journey, we have learned a lot externally and internally, therefore, we are keeping improving day by day. We are so delighted to be a partner for digital marketing content for your hoteling and tourism business, where the digital trend requires attractive digital content plus creativity, and we are also happy to be a memory saver for those couples, families as well as a corporate company.
We are unstoppable, get ready to be an outstanding entity that you can rely on for helping you and your business to grow with powerful digital content. With us, you and your business always stay updated and walk along with other companies regionally and globally.
